context: As of September 30, 2025, Zebra Technologies has trailing 12-month revenue of $5.25 billion and EPS of $10.67. Market cap of $21.39B with P/E ratio of 56.41 and beta of 1.64. Company operates in Electronic Equipment, Instruments & Components sector within Information Technology industry.
